data.name: Party Bots
data.detailed_description:
Every match in Party Bots is a new challenge because everything is random! Survive on your platform while random things happen all around you. Anything can happen, and you have to adapt to every situation to survive the challenge!



Party Bots supports up to 100 players in each lobby! Although, the use of powerful gaming computers is recommended in this case!



You start as a regular Y-bot, but that does not mean you have to look like everyone else! Customize your face, color, and hat to your heart's content!



Explosions and lasers can destroy platforms in a dynamic and fun way!



Everything around you can change in an instant! Did the lava turn into water? Why is there a mine on my platform? Can crates swim? You never know what will happen next!



Party Bots is a game about lots of Y-Bots training their AI in an arena where random things happen! You play as one of the bots trying to survive and make it out without getting destroyed!



Party Bots is all about surviving random events! Events can happen to you, your platform, or globally for everyone! The events can change platform sizes, make the player go fast, convert your platform to wood, and much more. There are over 60 different events right now, and more may be added!



You can take control of the game mode yourself and change everything to your liking! Don't like the explosive barrels? Remove them! Want things to happen faster? Reduce the time! Is the game too easy for you? Make it harder!



This can save you in the most dangerous situations, or just be fun!

data.short_description: Party Bots is an online party game for up to 100 players. Survive on your platform in a chaotic arena and be the last bot standing!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
